pr_title: XRDDEV-881 API for listing approved timestamping services

timeline.message:
XRDDEV-881 API for listing approved timestamping services

- Implement API for listing approved timestamping services.
- Update OpenAPI description.
- Add unit tests.

timeline.bodyText: We have tried to avoid calling services from converters to keep them nicely decoupled and the codebase consistent. Maybe change the converter to use GlobalConfFacade and call the required facade methods directly (globalConfFacade.getApprovedTspName(globalConfFacade.getInstanceIdentifier(), url);)
timeline.author: carohauta

timeline.message:
XRDDEV-881 Refactor TimestampingServiceConverter based on review comments

- Remove dependency to TimestampingServiceService.
- Update tests.
